EmailTemplate.subject: Application Deadline this Sunday 30th November - Apply Now!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Application Deadline this Sunday - APPLY NOW!
Christmas is around the corner but there's another important date to remember and that's the application deadline.
You have already taken the first steps towards securing your future by filling out an expression of interest form.
If you are selected onto Step Forward we will provide you with valuable work experience, invaluable personal and professional development training and a qualification that will set you apart from your peers, make you more employable and help you to launch your career in the future.
Those who are selected and graduate from Step Forward will have:
- Completed 12 months of full time work with a high quality employer received a salary of £9,000 - A nationally recognised qualification equivalent to an A-level - Developed essential skills that employers look for such as teamwork, leadership and problem solving - Received support from their own professional mentor to get the most of the year and beyond - Shared their experience with other likeminded people and formed lasting friendships​ Places are limited so if you want to be considered for Step Forward, take the next step by completing our Application form online, to ensure you are considered for the assessment stage. The deadline is this Sunday 30th November. Apply with your unique application form Here.
For hints and tips on how to write an impressive application form and maximise your chances of being selected, check out our website at www.stepforward.uk.com.
Like us on facebook and follow us on twitter to be kept up to date with the latest information.
Best of luck with your application, and we hope to see you at the Step Forward assessment!
Charlotte Hobson
Head of Step Forward Associate Recruitment
